title: viDavanurA nAvyathalu
sahitya:
viDavanurA nAvyatalu tIrcakuNTE viDavanurA

anupallavi

 jaDiyaka nA manOdhAramucE nI yaDukula ghaTTiga gaTTi bikiyinci

caraNam 1

 bhaktula pAliTi daivamugAna pAlinca kunna nE nigalinduna 
shakti lEdani nA cAlu bommamaNTuna jAla vidyalanu jEsinagAni
 
caraNam 2

 Apada vELala dhairyamicci brOcE avyAja karuNA mUrtivi nIvE 
shrIpatE nA cintala tIrcikA pADuTakikha kAlamu gaDipitE
 
caraNam 3

 yOgyA yOgyamu teliya lEni I bhAgyavantulacE bahu bAdhala paDunA 
bhAgyameTTidO malaninniTula bhakti sEyanaTu galigenu gAna
 
caraNam 4

 nI mahimAdula nEmiyu nerugani pAmaruDani oka palukaina balukavu 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavatAdula sAkSiga
